jrtr.glrenderer

Class VRRenderPanel.VRRenderContextEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrtr.glrenderer.VRRenderPanel.VRRenderContextEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jogamp.opengl.GLEventListener, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    VRRenderPanel

    private class VRRenderPanel.VRRenderContextEventListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.jogamp.opengl.GLEventListener
    An event listener for the GLJPanel to which this context renders. The main purpose of this event listener is to redirect display events to the renderer (the GLRenderContext).
